name: Germs Lite
description:
Germs Lite expands upon the unique liquid physics engine of "Gloop" to breathe new life into the "eat or be eaten" genre as germs engulf and pull each other apart.

Germs Lite is an extremely simple game to understand, pick up and play. Get new levels and compete to set high scores. Or create and share your own levels, textures, music and sound effects.
